# Bladebane (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[3rd Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 3]], [[2nd Level Paladin Spells|Paladin 2]], [[4th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 4]], [[4th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 4]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 6th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 6]], [[BoXM 8th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 8]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, M (a drop of blood and ruby dust worth 500 gp)

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** Weapon touched

**Duration:** 1 round/level

**Saving Throw:** Will negates (harmless, object)

**Spell Resistance:** Yes (harmless, object)

**Source:** Unapproachable East (WotC), pg. 48

You impart a deadly quality to a single bladed weapon (any slashing weapon) for a short time. *Bladebane* confers the *[[Bane (MagWpnSpcAb)|bane]]* ability on the weapon touched, against a creature type (and subtype, if necessary) of your choice. The weaponâ€™s enhancement bonus increases by +2 against the appropriate creature type, and it deals +2d6 points of bonus damage to those creatures.
